i understand that my community includes the rest of the world. So the 5-10% will go not just to local shelters, food banks, etc, but also to places like kiva and unicef.

Though, i like kiva, i am not happy that my capital is loaned with interest, and i receive no interest back. I'd rather there be no interest, but since there is, if part was returned to me, i could loan out that much more....

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make a difference in the world.
I know what it feels like to have a dream and few resources to achieve it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that want to purchase homes learn about the home buying process then locate the approproate property for them to acquire.

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: There are millions of people in the world that have aspirations and dreams, and a lack of money should not stop them from shooting for the stars.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part-time and I go to school full time, and I am grateful to have the opportunity to do both.

lenders.name: Cecelia
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to bless others.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand now and then.

lenders.name: Sahil
lenders.loan_because: if I can so should everyone.

lenders.name: Martyn
lenders.loan_because:
Kevin Spacey recently said...."If you catch the elevator up, don't forget to send it back down so someone else can come join you..." or words to that effect.

We may only be on the second floor, and using the stairs ourselves right now, but still trying to defy gravity in a small way.

lenders.name: Brock
lenders.loan_because: it mskes me happy to see all the good i can do
lenders.occupational_info: i attend a catholic school

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: One thing we should all do is help those who need help, and lending money is probably both the easiest and most effective way way to do just that for those who are far away.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to stimulate third-world economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see someone else succeed being self-employed
lenders.occupational_info: I am a gardener and work with plants

lenders.name: Frugalista Japan
lenders.loan_because:
- I am atheist. I believe it is the right thing to do.

- I live a frugal life so that I might give back to those in need

- I earn enough to live a good, full life. I hope that I can enable others to do so, too.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: It will change the world.

lenders.name: Nimish
lenders.loan_because: in my small way, I can give back
lenders.occupational_info: I look at how things run in a company, and I try and understand why they are that way, and how you need to change things to make the process better for your goals.  I do process analysis.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: it suits me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a philosopher.
